colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI BLO GROS RIG PA SHES RAB DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG AER TE NI PI LIG THU BLO BZANG RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA DANG, DGE SLONG CHOS RIN CHEN ZHES BYA BA GNYIS KA DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES MNAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU, ,^ KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED @007B DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS THA SHAL BA, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA DANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RIG DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , , ,BKRA SHIS, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
